actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that elections of officers of intermediate bodies of labor organizations may be by officers representative of the members in good standing only if any officer representative of less than 50 members is entitled to 1 vote and any officer representative of more than 50 members is entitled to 1 additional vote for every additional 50 members.

summary.text: Amends the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to weight the votes of local labor organization officers according to the number of members represented whenever such officers elect officers of intermediate labor organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that elections of officers of intermediate bodies of labor organizations may be by officers representative of the members in good standing only if any officer representative of less than 50 members is entitled to 1 vote and any officer representative of more than 50 members is entitled to 1 additional vote for every additional 50 members.
